scripts.start: node -e "const express = require('express'); const app = express(); app.use(express.static('.')); app.listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:3000'));"
scripts.dev: node -e "const express = require('express'); const app = express(); app.use(express.static('.')); app.listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:3000'));"
